alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 3:32PM CDT until August 05 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CRITTENDEN...SOUTHEASTERN CROSS AND WESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 331 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crawfordsville, or 7 miles southeast of Earle, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, Earle, Parkin, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Crawfordsville, Edmondson, Sunset, Jericho, Jennette, Southwest Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Crittenden, Clarkedale, Smithdale, Three Forks, Mound City, Booker and Gammon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
